sentences.sContent: The republican party has vociferously opposed any clemency for convicted terrorists.
sentences.sContent_eng: The republican party has vociferously opposed any clemency for convicted terrorists.
sentences.sCn: 共和党已经高声反对给被判有罪的恐怖分子以任何仁慈。

trans.tranCn: 温和； 仁慈， 宽厚
trans.tranOther: forgiveness and less severe punishment for a crime
